reviewText: I use these 3 minute Bible story DVD's for our church preschool's chapel time.  The kids love them - they can all sit still for 3 minutes - and we then talk about it after viewing it.  Highly recommend.
Great Bible dvd for kids. Biblically accurate yet easy for children to understand
We bought all the dvds available because we realized our son was soaking these Bible stories up! To be honest, we learned a lot, too.
